title: Rowing
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Charles Bluestone
provenance_text:
Louis Ritman [1889-1963] until 1963; estate of Louis Ritman, 1963 until 1964; Ontario East Gallery, Chicago, IL, c. 1964; Dr. and Mrs. Charles Bluestone, Pittsburgh, PA, 1964 until December 2007 [1]; with Spanierman Gallery, New York, NY, 1989 until 1990 [2]; gift of Dr. and Mrs. Charles Bluestone to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, December 2007. 

Notes:
[1]. See donor file.
[2]. The painting did not sell.
